input.sentences: the team strategized about how they would play against each other .

output.sentences: Today we celebrated Ian with a party.
The party was made up of two strategized teams to play.
We patiently looked at everything that was part of the game.
There were some intense gamers playing in these matches.
The results of the games were carefully discussed at the end.
